DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess pain response EUS guide celiac plexus block treatment compare treatment . The Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) primary measure . Secondary aim include comparison quality life score , need narcotic , assess effect EUS-CPB overall mental state use Beck 's Depression Index , assess effect EUS-CBP health care utilization employment .
